title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, June 16
description: Orlando continues to dominate the news as Donald Trump reiterates his call for a ban on Muslim immigrants. This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, White House correspondent Tamara Keith, campaign reporter Sarah McCammon, and political editor Domenico Montanaro. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
